items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Retails at over $70. Amazon got it for me for less than half of that and I look like the cat's meow! I love this sweater because it is cute and festive but you could wear it all year:) Read more
items.author: Happycat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy sweater
items.body: Love it, the design is so homey, perfect for quiet evenings. The material good quality 100% cotton, which is awesome, breathable and soft. It fits really well and can be worn in a different social settings. Read more
items.author: Space Cat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic styles last for many years
items.body: This is a sweater after my heart. It is 100% cotton, wash in cold, flat to dry out of the light, no dryer. People make fun of my laundry rules, but I have finally been vindicated. You should go ahead and get this sweater quickly, because it is aimed at Christmas with snowflakes on it. I can’t tell if the main color is black or navy blue, but to me it looks navy blue. It’s a thinner sweater, so I would definitely wear a dark bra with it. I know I say that a lot about shirts, but I will say it about a name brand shirt as easily as I will say it about an inexpensive shirt. I bought this in a medium, because I do not like my sweaters to be fitted. I could easily get a button-down shirt under this. This would look great with jeans or a skirt. I found no flaws in the manufacturing. The colors are crisp with no fading. It’s exactly what I’ve come to expect from this designer’s clothing. It’s very soft, and the style is classic. You can wear it this year and you can wear it 10 years from now. The neck is not cut too low, and it is not too tight at the bottom. The sleeves are the right length in line with the size. It’s just a really nice sweater. If you think the price is too much, think of the other things you have in your closet, the fabric they made of, and how many seasons they last. I think you’ll see that this is going to be the far better bargain. Read more
items.author: C. McCullers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well-made and flattering
items.body: This is a very well-made, flattering sweater. I love that it is 100% cotton, and it is perfect for the fall. It also runs true-to-size. Overall, I am very happy with it and would purchase again. Read more
items.author: Kim L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. If inbetween sizes, can size down and should still fit.
items.body: This is a medium thick weight sweater that isn't super bulky and is overall well made. I love the design. I am 5'3 and 170lbs and am pushing a 36DDD, I ordered a large and would say that this fits surpassingly well and is a smidge loose/baggy in the arms and doesn't fit snug, though due to my curves though I would not be able to size down and be comfortable because of how tight it would be on the bust. I expect that a toss in the dryer for a few should leave me with the perfect fit. If you are in between sizes, this is one you can definitely size down on! Read more
items.author: Laine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice fit and feel!
items.body: I’m surprised by how much I like this sweater. It’s actually a real dark navy blue and red/white. The pattern at the front of the shoulders does not extend to the back which usually bothers me but doesn’t with this sweater for some reason. It’s not loose, but not tight. The arms fit perfect and that’s usually harder to find for me because my upper arm circumference is larger than average for my size. The V neck is fairly low, but not indecent. When I tried it on, my husband said, “oh that looks NICE”. He doesn’t usually comment on my clothes, so I can solidly say that it must look pretty nice then! I love that it’s 100% cotton but it’s not chunky. The yarns it is made from are pretty fine. The interior of the design has been knitted to keep from having loops of the different colors catching on things. I think it would look good paired with a pleated skirt or denim. I may wear a shirt underneath but it doesn’t really need one. It is not see through and has full coverage when I raise my arms. As for size, I am 5’7” tall, 220 pounds and I usually wear a size 16 in almost everything. I have larger than average upper arms and an average bust size. I got this in XL and it’s the perfect fit! I recommend this sweater! Read more
items.author: Aquarijen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern fit with Xennial vibes!
items.body: This sweatshirt instantly took me back to middle school in the late 90s (be still my Xennial heart!). It has that perfect nostalgic vibe while still feeling and looking modern. The material is soft, warm, and really comfortable, and the quality is exactly what I’d expect from a trusted brand like this. It’s the kind of piece that makes you feel both cozy and effortlessly cool. I’ve worn it several times, and it holds up great after washing too. I am 5’9” with longer arms than most sweaters seem to accommodate, but this one fits nicely and it is true to size. Read more
items.author: MrsMJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well-made and pairs with any outfit
items.body: This sweater is very flattering on and well-made. It's not extremely heavy, so you could layer a tank or t-shirt underneath. But it's also not so lightweight that you would be cold in the winter. I am 5'5", 128 lbs, and 34DD. I typically will wear a medium in shirts, and that's what I ordered. I like that it's not skin-hugging tight but also not too loose. It really is so versatile that I feel I could wear it in multiple seasons. The red pattern is on the front of the chest and shoulders as well as on the bottom of the sleeve. There is also a little TH logo flag at the bottom of one sleeve. I think it's quite stylish, and I'll likely wear it often! Read more
items.author: Kim M

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Captain Fairisle. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
